name: Eolo
description:
Eolo is an arcade space shoot'em up in where you play as a ship shooting stuff. The goal of the game is to kill as much stuff possible. And of course, survive.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

X: Shoot Lasers

Spacebar: Pause

Mouse: Click buttons

I hope you enjoy Eolo and I hope you look forward to my future games. Also, don't forget to comment and review Eolo. Enjoy!

Click here to listen to Eolo's OST:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLt2pekTo-iD_jdx9xEbyY9ttbvmyRUvWk
